Uses of Interface
org.la4j.matrix.functor.MatrixAccumulator

  • Packages that use MatrixAccumulator 
    Package Description
    org.la4j.matrix  

    • Uses of MatrixAccumulator in org.la4j.matrix

      Methods in org.la4j.matrix that return MatrixAccumulator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MatrixAccumulator Matrices.asProductAccumulator(double neutral)
      Creates a product matrix accumulator that calculates the product of all elements in the matrix.
      static MatrixAccumulator Matrices.asProductFunctionAccumulator(double neutral, MatrixFunction function)
      Creates a product function accumulator, that calculates the product of all elements in the matrix after applying given function to each of them.
      static MatrixAccumulator Matrices.asSumAccumulator(double neutral)
      Creates a sum matrix accumulator that calculates the sum of all elements in the matrix.
      static MatrixAccumulator Matrices.asSumFunctionAccumulator(double neutral, MatrixFunction function)
      Creates a sum function accumulator, that calculates the sum of all elements in the matrix after applying given function to each of them.
      static MatrixAccumulator Matrices.mkMaxAccumulator()
      Makes a maximum matrix accumulator that accumulates the maximum of matrix elements.
      static MatrixAccumulator Matrices.mkMinAccumulator()
      Makes a minimum matrix accumulator that accumulates the minimum of matrix elements.
      Methods in org.la4j.matrix with parameters of type MatrixAccumulator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Matrix.fold(MatrixAccumulator accumulator)
      Folds all elements of this matrix with given accumulator.
      double AbstractMatrix.fold(MatrixAccumulator accumulator) 
      double Matrix.foldColumn(int j, MatrixAccumulator accumulator)
      Folds all elements of specified column in this matrix with given accumulator.
      double AbstractMatrix.foldColumn(int j, MatrixAccumulator accumulator) 
      Vector Matrix.foldColumns(MatrixAccumulator accumulator)
      Folds all elements (in column-by-column manner) of this matrix with given accumulator.
      Vector AbstractMatrix.foldColumns(MatrixAccumulator accumulator) 
      double Matrix.foldRow(int i, MatrixAccumulator accumulator)
      Folds all elements of specified row in this matrix with given accumulator.
      double AbstractMatrix.foldRow(int i, MatrixAccumulator accumulator) 
      Vector Matrix.foldRows(MatrixAccumulator accumulator)
      Folds all elements (in row-by-row manner) of this matrix with given accumulator.
      Vector AbstractMatrix.foldRows(MatrixAccumulator accumulator)
